en.title: British Longhair Personality and Characteristics | The Fluffy Long-Haired Breed
en.content:
The British Longhair (BLH) is the long-haired version of the British Shorthair. Retaining the Shorthair\'s calm personality with a fluffy long coat, this charming breed has been growing in popularity in recent years.

Characteristics of the British Longhair

The basic body type and facial features are the same as the British Shorthair, but the rich medium-to-long coat is the key difference. Chocolate golden colorations are particularly beautiful, and their teddy bear-like appearance is very popular.

Personality

Like the British Shorthair, they have a calm and gentle temperament. While they have an independent streak, they have deep affection for their family and are the type to quietly enjoy spending time together.

Coat Care

As a long-haired breed, brushing 2–3 times per week is recommended. During shedding season (spring and fall), daily brushing is ideal. Pay careful attention to areas prone to matting such as the underarms and belly. At Fuluck Cattery, we train kittens to get accustomed to brushing from an early age.

zh.title: 英国长毛猫的性格与特征 | 毛茸茸的长毛品种
zh.content:
英国长毛猫（BLH）是英国短毛猫的长毛版本。保留了短毛猫温和的性格，同时拥有蓬松的长毛，这个迷人的品种近年来人气不断攀升。

英国长毛猫的特征

基本体型和面部特征与英国短毛猫相同，但中长毛的丰厚被毛是最大的区别。尤其是巧克力金色系的毛色非常漂亮，泰迪熊般的可爱外表深受欢迎。

性格

与英国短毛猫一样，性格温和稳重。虽然有一定的独立性，但对家人的感情深厚，属于喜欢安静享受共处时光的类型。

被毛护理

作为长毛品种，建议每周梳毛2~3次。特别是在换毛季（春季和秋季），每天梳毛是最理想的。容易打结的腋下和腹部周围需要仔细护理。福楽猫舍从幼猫时期就开始训练它们适应梳毛。
